= Introduction =

Apache Ant is a Java-based build tool. In theory, it is kind of like make, without make's wrinkles.

= Installation =

The latest version of the Ant is 1.7.1. The installation is very simply, download the binary code and install it, in the Linux, apt-get or yum would be fine. In Windows, just set the path and ANT_HOME environment variable.
